attributes.title: Loser's Block: The First To Melt
attributes.caption:
(CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 1 Spoilers)
Welcome to Loser's Block where host Geoff Ramsey and the first contestant voted off Survive Block Island Meltdown discuss the puzzling clash of Fire vs. Ice.
attributes.description:

attributes.title: Loser's Block: Number 2 On The Block
attributes.caption: (CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 2 Spoilers) A pig race sends a contestant all the way back home. Host Geoff Ramsey chats with the second contestant voted off Survive Block Island Meltdown.
attributes.description: (CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 2 Spoilers) A pig race sends a contestant all the way back home. Host Geoff Ramsey chats with the second contestant voted off Survive Block Island Meltdown.
attributes.display_title: PSLB:E2 - Loser's Block: Number 2 On The Block

attributes.title: Another Crack in the Game
attributes.caption: While one team is on a hot steak, the other is cracking under pressure.  Geoff is here to dive into alliances and betrayals with our 3rd elimination.
attributes.description: While one team is on a hot steak, the other is cracking under pressure.  Geoff is here to dive into alliances and betrayals with our 3rd elimination.
attributes.display_title: PSLB:E3 - Another Crack in the Game

attributes.title: Hold your Tongue and Totems
attributes.caption: The chopping block has become a battle ground of items and votes but will those be enough?  Geoff is going to dive into this exciting vote with the recently deceased.
attributes.description: The chopping block has become a battle ground of items and votes but will those be enough?  Geoff is going to dive into this exciting vote with the recently deceased.
attributes.display_title: PSLB:E4 - Hold your Tongue and Totems

attributes.title: Good versus Evil
attributes.caption: (CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 5 Spoilers) In this epic clash of right and wrong, honor and disgrace, good vs evil… only one shall fail.  Come join Geoff in talking through what happened in Survive Block Island’s fifth elimination!
attributes.description: (CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 5 Spoilers) In this epic clash of right and wrong, honor and disgrace, good vs evil… only one shall fail.  Come join Geoff in talking through what happened in Survive Block Island’s fifth elimination!

attributes.title: Earth’s Mightiest Loser
attributes.caption: (CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 6 Spoilers) The meltdown has hit the halfway point and with it comes our first merge elimination!  Alliances clash in this episode and Geoff is, as always, here to break down what happened with today’s Loser.
attributes.description: (CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 6 Spoilers) The meltdown has hit the halfway point and with it comes our first merge elimination!  Alliances clash in this episode and Geoff is, as always, here to break down what happened with today’s Loser.

attributes.title: Treasure and Treachery
attributes.caption: On Meltdown, there is no shortage of items and advantages but who has what it takes to find them?  Geoff’s guest today on Loser’s Block was eliminated without a chance to really prove their prowess begging the question, were they gone too soon?
attributes.description: On Meltdown, there is no shortage of items and advantages but who has what it takes to find them?  Geoff’s guest today on Loser’s Block was eliminated without a chance to really prove their prowess begging the question, were they gone too soon?

attributes.title: Don’t Lose your Head
attributes.caption: (CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 8 Spoilers) Survive Block Meltdown is down to 4 players with its most recent elimination and Geoff wants to know, “whose going to win?”  Let’s talk with our 5th place contestant for predictions and a surprise guest!
attributes.description: (CAUTION: This is the post show and contains Episode 8 Spoilers) Survive Block Meltdown is down to 4 players with its most recent elimination and Geoff wants to know, “whose going to win?”  Let’s talk with our 5th place contestant for predictions and a surprise guest!
